Spacious living area connecting to the outdoor swimming pool view.
A formal dining space adjacent to the living room for family gatherings.
Private bedroom with additional closet area and east facing window for morning sunlight.
Comfortable guest room with built-in storage.
Shared space for children in line with joint family needs.

common_areas.description: Multi-purpose space for joint family interactions, featuring built-in storage and flexible layout.
